name: Typer Dungeon
description:
Typer Dungeon is a single player typing game, where you type on your keyboard to defeat your foes. Gather spells, use them, type - and do it fast.

Not comfortable using the keyboard yet? Don't worry. The difficulty settings go from one-finger-puncher to ten-finger-master.

This game is currently an early prototype so feel free to download the game for free. If you want to support the development, consider either purchasing the game and/or joining us at GameLoom Studio discord to share your feedback and keep up to date. This is where we hang out.

To play, simply download the zip below, extract and run the executable. The game should run on any Windows PC or laptop that is not ancient. If you want other operating systems supported, please contact us on Discord (see link above).

For general news, contact and updates - head over to https://www.gameloomstudio.com/
